name: Lite Messenger
description: A free, lite messenger app which allows you to chat, call, video call with your Facebook friends, send emoticon, videos, images, gift, browse newsfeed, comments, etc... and yes, much less permissions.    Save your battery and memory  - Lite Messenger takes only 4MB to download and roughly 30MB after installing - Background connections to Facebook server is optimized - This messenger lite uses no more than 20MB RAM - Lite Messenger uses a simplified version of Messenger layout    Protect you privacy  - Login and chat instantly using Facebook account with public profile (we dont need this but its given by default by Facebook) - This messenger lite requires only handful of permissions to let you send and receive images downloaded from Facebook - If your Android version is later than 5, we also request permission accessing camera for video calls - Please take a look at our privacy policy at the end of this page for more information    Very smart and easy to use - Small footprint app functions similar as the 2 official apps.  - Push notifications from Facebook to make sure that you never miss a message - Lite Messenger is compatible with older Android versions - Send images, download videos from Facebook. - Lite Messenger allows video call and voice call on Android 5 and later. - Implemented night mode (other color themes will soon be added)  This Messenger Lite is an alternative messenger and is no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with, Facebook. Facebook is a trademark of Facebook, Inc.    If you like it, give 5 stars and leave comments, report bugs or suggest us any features.  Follow Messenger Lite on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/faceb0ok.messenger Follow Messenger Lite on Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/110300112096760431278  **** Notice *** 1.Loosing position on newsfeed: Go to settings and check open post in new tabs  2. Ads. We need to feed our cat :| You can upgrade or share the app to remove ads.  3: Upload, download image, video, files, go to Settings -> select Enable upload by Graph API
